wikipedia_page.main: John Read is an English former professional snooker player. Read competed between the years of 1991 and 2003, with his highest ranking being 62nd in the world. His most notable tournament run was at the 1996 Malta Masters, where he was beaten in the final by Mark Davis.

response: *John Read (Mississippi politician) (born 1941), member of the Mississippi House of Representatives
*John Read (Connecticut politician) (1633–1730), member of the Connecticut House of Representatives from Norwalk
*John Read (Australian politician) (born 1939), member of the Legislative Assembly of Western Australia
*John Read (New Zealand politician) (1874–1942), local body politician and trade unionist
*John Read (pirate) (fl. 1683–1688), British privateer, buccaneer, and pirate
*John Read (lawyer) (1769–1854), United States lawyer and banker
*John Read (art film maker) (1923–2011), producer of art documentaries for the BBC from 1951 to 1983
*John Read (psychologist), psychologist and mental health researcher
*John Read (inventor), inventor who developed a rotating doubler electrostatic generator
His best result in the UK Championship came in 1998, where he beat Jamie Burnett and John Read, before losing to Matthew Stevens in the last 16.
Mark Davis won the event, beating John Read 6–3 in the final.Davis crowned World Champion. - Hastings & St. Leonards Observer (St. Leonards-on-Sea, England) | HighBeam Research
